idea: RapidQube Digital Solutions Pvt Ltd. is a 2016 start-up focusing on next generation, disruptive technology solutions leveraging a range of blockchain platforms and the associated front-end, middleware and back-end technologies that bring a complete blockchain ecosystem to life. We are global by design. Our main office is in Mumbai along with an architecture hub & development center in Chennai
name: RapidQube Digital Solutions Private Limited

idea:
Taaraka engine curates accurate insights for you daily based on ancient wisdom of jyotisa or vedic astrology and modern technology such as machine learning and translates the content in today’s context.

Most of the content around astrology on the internet expects you to have some prior knowledge and many people get lost in the vast technicalities of the subject.

Ancient wisdom of jyotisa or vedic astrology can be useful to entire mankind, it can help you navigate complexity of life, provide better know-how about you and can help you live a more fulfilled life.


Taaraka app provides daily insights about your life. These daily insights are content to read which throws light on various aspects such as your personality, career, wealth, relationships, health, opportunities, threats etc. It is able to do this by using ancient wisdom of sciences like Vedic astrology and combining it with modern technology like machine learning, to provide you with unprecedented customised and personalised experience.
name: Taaraka Technologies

idea:

name: MARKYTICS CONSULTING PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
VAUCH InfoTech is into Web and Mobile based Software Development. The Technologies that we use for developing Web Applications are C#, .Net MVC, PHP (Laravel), Node.js, MS SQL, My SQL Database, Angular 4,5 & 6, HTML 5, CSS, React.js, Bootstrap, and Ionic & React Native for Mobile App Development.

VAUCH InfoTech also provides multiple services such as Consulting, Customized Software Development.

VAUCH InfoTech’s Team has years of Experience developing multiple Platforms for diversified Domains such as Banking & Finance, eCommerce, eLearning, Insurance, etc.

VAUCH InfoTech’s Team has years of experience developing Wealth & Portfolio Management System, IPO, Back base (Digital Platform for Banks), BlockChain, Document Management System, Digital Marketing, Supply Chain Management for eCommerce, Business to Business Platform, Business to Customer Platforms, Cataloging System for wide range of Categories. Claim Management System for Insurance Companies.
name: VAUCH INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Quality assurance always leads over quantity.

Digital services are in demand whether it is a small business owner or a well-established business. 

Having a business without any marketing strategies is

similar to an "interview without a resume".

Building websites and mobile applications are in the growing demand for business.

Idealite provides the service of convenient, cost effective and easily accessible

websites for a business owner, market developer or a retailer.

Building community and evolving business is crucial in today's market,

and to gain the trust of consumers and the testimonials.

Also, some business developers look forward for a personalized and

fast service to increase their visibility in the market, where mobile

application is a great way.

Our utility provides both Android and IOS app development to help improve

your corporate branding and reputation which will help your product

to reach out to the spectators.
name: IDEALITE TECHNOLOGIES LLP
